Summary: A strange metallic object in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsMany years ago (sometime in the mid-70s), I was outside my house on a clearsummer day, and noticed something in the sky. It looked like two silvery spheresstuck together, and moved slowly but steadily without leaving a vapor trail,until it disappeared over the horizon. I wondered if it might be an alienspacecraft, but doubted it -- and still doubt it, but have no idea what itreally was.
